alert.note: Alert for Salt Lake Valley; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 29 at 5:01PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Salt Lake County through 530 PM MDT... At 501 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Kearns, or over West Valley City, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Salt Lake City, West Valley City, Murray, West Jordan, Taylorsville, South Salt Lake, Millcreek, Kearns, Salt Lake City International Airport, Magna, Oquirrh, Canyon Rim, East Millcreek, Sugarhouse and University Of Utah. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 301 and 311. Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 114 and 127. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Salt Lake Valley; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North
